title: Upgrade from Codehaus Groovy 3.x to Apache Groovy 4.x

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body:
### Description

Groovy 4.0.0 has been released at the beginning of 2022. it might be nice to move to the latest version.

There is a long list of features and bug fixes http://groovy-lang.org/changelogs/changelog-4.0.0.html

Based on https://groovy.apache.org/versioning.html 3.x will have one or two bugfixes release (in fact already 3 happened). So good chances that there will be only security release of 3.x soon.


### Implementation ideas

_No response_
